channel.title: Zermon 718 - Your Greatest Adventure // Unique Content
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/246w879.jpg[/img]
Website: [url=http://zermon728.info]http://zermon728.info[/url] Download: [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/66038819/Zermon.jar]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/66038819/Zermon.jar[/url]
[B]Welcome[/B] Zermon is a RuneScape Private Server aimed at entertainment made by our Development Team for players. Zermon aims to capture a flawless gameplay experience for our players with features that the community wants rather than what the development team. Zermon has alot of features including minigames, quests, skilling, pking, pvming and alot more. Please stay up with our community forums to keep up with the latest updates. Zermon focuses on player satiscation with daily updates and a large amount of content available! So what are you waiting for? You can play instantly and create yourself a new adventure!
[B]Zermon's Features[/B]
VPS Hosted, 24/7 Webclient - Play on Browser Automatic Voting Grand Exchange Dueling On-Spot Notes Tab Slayer Boss' Tasks Dual Wielding Penguin's Event Clans & Settings Crashed Stars Xp Counter Dungeoneering Security – Set a Bank PIN Scroll & Pouch creation Special Attacks Loyalty Points - Working Auras Multi Barrage & Autocasting Untrimmed & Trimmed Capes Working Teleblocking Dominion Tower Spirit Shield Creation Corporeal Beast Drygores, Including Off-Hands Ascensions Crossbow Deathtouched Darts
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/f0dr94.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/358qtk5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2ms1qgh.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/256wto4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/14wpzmb.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/1hb2h3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/xcrpds.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/i71z7o.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/33en8f8.jpg[/img][/center]
